section.title: DockBook XSL
section.para: The DockBook XSL provides stylesheets. The stylesheets are used to transform and format the XML document for display. They are provided by the docbook-xsl and docbook-xsl-doc-pdf packages. To install the packages issue the following.
The stylesheets are installed in /usr/share/.../fo/ directory. The important one is docbook.xsl.
section.programlisting: $ ls /usr/share/xml/docbook/stylesheet/docbook-xsl/fo/ admon.xsl division.xsl info.xsl refentry.xsl annotations.xsl docbook.xsl inline.xsl sections.xsl autoidx-kimber.xsl ebnf.xsl keywords.xsl spaces.xsl autoidx-kosek.xsl footnote.xsl lists.xsl synop.xsl autoidx-ng.xsl fop.xsl math.xsl table.xsl ...
